amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand the term "special rule" to include any safety product rule governing products used or consumed by children under 2 years of age.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-1 to expand the term "special rule" to include any safety product rule governing products used or consumed by children under 2 years of age.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 234 (Roll no. 17).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 234 (Roll no. 17).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
